game.name: SWORD ART ONLINE Fractured Daydream
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 《소드 아트 온라인》 게임 10주년 기념 작품 제2탄이 등장. 다양한 역할을 가진 SAO 시리즈의 캐릭터들이 기억을 넘어 참전. 전 세계의 플레이어들과 함께 최대 20명이 팀을 맺어 앞길을 가로막는 강대한 적에게 맞서는 온라인 협력 액션. 시공간과 기억을 넘어――
game.shortDescriptionEn: Introducing the 2nd installment for the 10th anniversary of SWORD ART ONLINE! A total of 21 characters from the series join the battle beyond memory—a challenge taken on solo or with friends. Go beyond memory... and Switch!

reviewHighlights.text: I wonder why i buy this game... maybe just an aspiration of support. - Story is not interesting at all, the way character meets is so forced and pushe...
Not many players around but it's still fun and playable.
